TopicTitle: Still possible to become a Test Subject?

Articles.Content:
Is it still possible to apply to be a 'Volunteer Test Subject'?

I looked in my account settings and failed to find on option to apply.

Sorry, but no. The test team is currently full and closed to new applications. An announcement will be made if new members are needed.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
What about the volunteer booster catchers? I suppose there would always be openings for that job.
I would need an awfully large glove
